title: Internal Compiler Error: unimplemented relocation addend Relocation

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
To reproduce On m1 Mac, try to build [rustc_codegen_cranelift](https://github.com/bjorn3/rustc_codegen_cranelift) ```Shell git clone https://github.com/bjorn3/rustc_codegen_cranelift.git cd rustc_codegen_cranelift ./y.rs prepare ./y.rs build ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.67.0-nightly (b7bc90fea 2022-11-21) binary: rustc commit-hash: b7bc90fea3b441234a84b49fdafeb75815eebbab commit-date: 2022-11-21 host: aarch64-apple-darwin release: 1.67.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.4 ``` ### Error output ``` (error: error writing object file: unimplemented relocation Relocation { offset: 32, size: 32, kind: Relative, encoding: Generic, symbol: SymbolId(7), addend: -4 }) ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: 0x1051bf7b8 - ::fmt::h86f81dea2431b255 1: 0x105210fa0 - core::fmt::write::h99cc000a520a5f0a 2: 0x1051b2cbc - std::io::Write::write_fmt::h6dfe77e87020576e 3: 0x1051bf5cc - std::sys_common::backtrace::print::h212135278ba731fd 4: 0x1051c2074 - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::he39bf9e88678c8e4 5: 0x1051c1dcc - std::panicking::default_hook::hecb628a57e2b11ab 6: 0x10d2cc8f0 - rustc_driver[20b538c9ae0efabc]::DEFAULT_HOOK::{closure#0}::{closure#0} 7: 0x1051c2774 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::h281ab4d4a0a242eb 8: 0x1051c256c - std::panicking::begin_panic_handler::{{closure}}::h41fe6af004fb1f91 9: 0x1051bfc20 - std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_end_short_backtrace::h4ef2f20b32cf1766 10: 0x1051c22c0 - _rust_begin_unwind 11: 0x10523c7f8 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::ha57b2e7491fac64b 12: 0x10523c9e0 - core::result::unwrap_failed::hf9967ba2128dfb26 13: 0x1062be4d4 - cranelift_object::backend::ObjectModule::finish::h338ef518e59c3625 14: 0x106219984 - rustc_codegen_cranelift::driver::aot::emit_cgu::hbe84eddba00ba78d 15: 0x10621c7dc - std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::ha0bbc12d9af7e54a 16: 0x10624f664 - core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once{{vtable.shim}}::h9f74dab3b6869b0a 17: 0x1051caab4 - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::hcb03e9b32fbe8c31 18: 0x1abe3a06c - __pthread_deallocate ```

Full log attached [log.txt](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/files/10129869/log.txt)
